content: **about ** available sizes one size 20 22″ 51 56cm head circumference pattern format written pattern no chart pattern language english skill level beginner pdf format printer friendly bonus checklist **techniques ** knit in the round knit & purl stitches **materials ** yarn weight super bulky yardage 30 40 yards 27 36 meters suggested yarn lion brand wool ease thick & quick needle size us 11 8mm circular needles with a 16″ 40cm cable or dpns **terms ** a physical product will not be shipped a knitting pattern is a set of instructions reselling rewriting or distributing the pattern itself is prohibited due to the fact that this is digital media refunds are not available if you re a knitter you re welcome to create products from my patterns to sell credit would be great if have any questions please contact me thank you so much jennifer bromefields com you can grab this pattern for **free** on my website
